title: I have this habit of playing female characters
body:
And it's all because of this :

When I was little and I started playing video games, my lil' boy mind thought
"since the female characters are smaller and more leaner, they're more "agile" and move around faster"

So basically I thought girls were OP 
And now because of that habit I lean towards female characters

######And I always get mistaken as a girl for it smh
